official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present in the name of Congress, a medal to Brig.  Gen. Charles E. Yeager.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of the Congress, to Brigadier General Charles E. Yeager, United States Air Force, a silver medal equivalent to a noncombat Medal of Honor for piloting the XS-1 research airplane faster than the speed of sound on October 14, 1947. Authroizes the appropriation of $5,500 for such purpose. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to coin duplicates in bronze of such medal to be sold in order to cover the costs of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present in the name of Congress, a medal to Brig.  Gen. Charles E. Yeager.
